fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Infect a player with the plague.
- Desinfect any number of players you want.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know the name of infected players at all times.
- If you die, all infected players are put in your will automatically, including the ones who were infected tonight.
- You may multitask.
- Players who visit you become infected, you may disable this passive each night.
- Players who visit infected players also become infected.
- Randomly, between day 3 to 6, the Town will be informed that a plague has consumed the Town, you will not know when it will happen.
